_comment: MCP Servers Configuration - Optimized for fast startup
_readme: Lite version (100ms startup, 4 core tools) is the default. Full version loads all modules eagerly (30s+ startup). Commands are workspace-relative (project root).

_disabled_full_version._warning: Full version has ALL 33 tools but 30s+ startup time due to module loading. Lazy loading attempted but not achievable with Simple runtime (imports are compile-time, not runtime).
_disabled_full_version._to_enable: Rename '_disabled_full_version' to 'simple-mcp-full' and restart Claude Code

simple-mcp-full._info: 33 tools (16 debug + 6 debug_log + 11 diag) - SLOW startup ~30s
